name: which-key
description: Display available keybindings in a panel

isVisible.description: Show the key bindings guide at the bottom of the workspace

failedTimeout.name: Failed Timeout (in seconds)
failedTimeout.description: Controls for how long the panel showing a failed keystroke will be shown

partialMatchTimeout.name: Partial Match Timeout (in seconds)
partialMatchTimeout.description: Controls for how long the panel showing a partially matched keystroke will be shown

showBindingsDelay.name: Show Bindings Delay (in seconds)
showBindingsDelay.description: How long it will take for the key bindings panel to show up after a partial keystroke

enum.description: Atom style: CTRL-w, ALT-b, BACKSPACE, RIGHT
Emacs style: C-w, M-b, BACKSPACE, RIGHT

keystrokesFormat.description: Format for the keystrokes regarding individual and modifier keys
